content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text woodmart_inline=”no” text_larger=”no”]

The Botslab Smart Outdoor Pan/Tilt Camera W312 is a versatile and advanced security camera designed for outdoor use. Key features include its ability to pan 355 degrees and tilt 90 degrees, providing comprehensive coverage of the surrounding area. It offers high-definition video quality with 1080p resolution, ensuring clear and detailed footage. The camera is equipped with night vision capabilities, allowing for around-the-clock monitoring.

One of the main benefits of the W312 is its smart motion detection technology, which can differentiate between humans and other moving objects, reducing false alarms. When motion is detected, the camera sends real-time alerts to the user’s smartphone. The camera also supports two-way audio, enabling users to listen and speak through the device remotely.

The W312 is designed to withstand harsh weather conditions, with a robust build and IP65 weatherproof rating. It offers flexible storage options, including cloud storage and local storage via a microSD card. The camera integrates seamlessly with smart home ecosystems, allowing for voice control and automation.

Unique selling points of the Botslab W312 include its easy installation process, user-friendly app for remote access and control, and the ability to set up smart tracking that automatically follows moving objects. Its combination of wide coverage, smart features, and durability make it an attractive option for those looking to enhance their home security.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered:
• 2.5K 4MP HD
  • 2.4GHz /5GHz Wi-Fi
  • Multi-scenes AI recognition
  • 360° Smart Tracking
  • Large Aperture Lens
  • Crystal Clear & Immersive Sound
  • Low-Light Full Color Night Vision
  • Support NVR/ONVIF
